thread.title: Worker Dies on Offshore Drilling Rig
thread.title_full: Worker Dies on Offshore Drilling Rig - WSJ

author: Alison Sider
title: Worker Dies on Offshore Drilling Rig
text:
A worker died on an offshore drilling rig in the Gulf of Mexico, federal regulators said Tuesday.
The worker was employed by Pacific Drilling SA, which owns the Pacific Santa Ana drillship. The company is investigating the cause of the incident, spokeswoman Amy Roddy said.
